title: Chocolate coconut trifle
ingredients: ['1 (397g) tin condensed sweetened milk', '400ml milk', '200ml coconut milk', '3 egg yolks', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '8 tablespoons cocoa powder', '200g desiccated coconut', '1 packet sponge fingers (about 15)', 'extra milk, for dipping', '200ml whipping cream, whipped to stiff peaks', '100g desiccated coconut, toasted', 'chocolate shavings, to decorate']
